responses.rationale: The segment describes the cause of disease spread, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment reports the numerical metric '23 states have confirmed cases' using standard descriptive verbs.
The segment reports the location of cases, not prices, economic data, or numerical metrics.
The segment reports numerical metrics like 'about 22 million birds' using standard descriptive verbs.
The segment reports numerical metrics like 'about 13 million chickens and 305,000 turkeys' using standard descriptive verbs.
The segment reports the numerical metric '46 million chickens' using a standard descriptive verb.
The segment reports the numerical metric 'about 11.7 million turkeys annually' using a standard descriptive verb.
